Description: All around the world!
ActualRequirements: Either kill or get killed by a mob

Description: Pick a flower for someone special
ActualRequirements: Obtain any flower

AdvancementName: There's a zombie on the lawn!
Description: Find a sunflower plains
ActualRequirements: Enter a sunflower plains biome

Description: Find a flower forest
Parent: There's a zombie on the lawn!
ActualRequirements: Enter a flower forest biome

Description: Find a Cherry Grove
ActualRequirements: Enter a Cherry Grove biome

Description: Collect all types of flowers
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following items: Dandelion, Poppy, Blue Orchid, Allium, Azure Bluet, Red Tulip, Orange Tulip, White Tulip, Pink Tulip, Oxeye Daisy, Sunflower, Lilac, 
Rose Bush, Peony, Cornflower, Lily of the Valley, Wither Rose, Torchflower, Pitcher Plant

Description: Go for a safari in the jungle
ActualRequirements: Enter any jungle biome (including bamboo jungle biomes)

Description: Swing (or climb) on some vines
ActualRequirements: Enter a vine block

Description: Feed an Ocelot fish to try and gain its trust
Breed a baby ocelot
Notes: "Lion Tamer" - Tame an ocelot - was removed in 1.6

Description: Break down some bamboo
ActualRequirements: Obtain bamboo

Description: Craft and use some scaffolding
ActualRequirements: Place scaffolding

Description: Place scaffolding to the world limit
ActualRequirements: Place scaffolding at y=319 in the Overworld or y=255 in the Nether or End

Description: Breed two pandas to get a baby panda
Get beaten up by an angry panda
ActualRequirements: Get killed by a panda

Description: Enter a Modified Jungle Edge - the rarest biome in Minecraft
Notes: Originally added in 1.10 Beta Build 6, then removed in 1.10 Beta Build 9

Description: Breed a rare brown panda
ActualRequirements: Breed two pandas and have the offspring be a brown panda

Description: Feed cake to every type of panda
ActualRequirements: Have all seven panda personalities pick up cake that you dropped on the ground
Source: Original, name is a Minecraft Dungeons Achievement

Description: Slip and slide on some ice
ActualRequirements: Step on ice

Description: Fall into some Powder Snow
ActualRequirements: Enter a block of powder snow

Description: Walk on Powder Snowâ€¦ without sinking in it
ActualRequirements: Walk on powder snow while wearing Leather Boots

Description: Get completely frozen inside two blocks of Powder Snow for a loooong time. Big question is: Can you do this all day?
ActualRequirements: For 20 minutes in a row, stand inside two blocks of Powder Snow (one at your feet, one at your head) without wearing any leather armor (such that you're taking damage from freezing)

Description: Pick up some Powder Snow in a Bucket
Mine some ice using a silk touch pickaxe
ActualRequirements: Obtain ice

Description: Break down an ice spike using a silk touch pickaxe
ActualRequirements: Obtain packed ice

Description: Craft or mine a blue ice block from an iceberg
ActualRequirements: Obtain blue ice

Description: Obtain a stack of every type of ice in your inventory
ActualRequirements: Obtain 64 ice, 64 packed ice, and 64 blue ice

Description: It may be illegal to hunt polar bears in real life, but not in Minecraft
ActualRequirements: Kill a polar bear

AdvancementName: We're Going on a Bear Hunt
Description: Get hunted by a Polar Bear
ActualRequirements: Get killed by a polar bear

Description: Go for a swim
ActualRequirements: Enter water

Description: Find an ocean
ActualRequirements: Enter any ocean biome (See note 8)

Description: Craft and ride a boat to sail on the high seas
ActualRequirements: Enter a boat or chest boat

Description: Dive into water from a cliff at least 50 blocks tall
ActualRequirements: Fall at least 50 blocks and land in water

Description: Stay underwater for 2 minutes
ActualRequirements:
Warning: The counter may reset if you pass through or close to certain waterlogged blocks that can be placed out of water such as coral, coral fans, sea pickles, or other manufactured blocks like slab, ladders or trapdoors placed underwater
Waterloggable blocks that cannot be placed out of water (kelp and seagrass) will not cause the counter to reset

Description: Spend a day underwater
ActualRequirements:
Warning: The counter may reset if you pass through or close to certain waterlogged blocks that can be placed out of water such as coral, coral fans, sea pickles, or other manufactured blocks like slab, ladders or trapdoors placed underwater
Waterloggable blocks that cannot be placed out of water (kelp and seagrass) will not cause the counter to reset

Description: Ride a Boat with a Chest in it
ActualRequirements: Enter a chest boat

Description: Give a Dolphin something to play with
ActualRequirements: Have a Dolphin nudge an item that you threw

Description: Get a speed boost from your friendly underwater companions
ActualRequirements: Get the Dolphin's Grace effect

AdvancementName: So Long & Thanks For The Fish
Description: Get murdered by dolphins
Come across a coral reef in an ocean
ActualRequirements: Enter a Warm Ocean biome

Description: Collect some sea pickles from a coral reef
ActualRequirements: Obtain sea pickles

Description: Collect some coral from a coral reef
ActualRequirements: Obtain dead or living coral, coral fan or coral block in any color

Description: Collect all colors of coral blocks, coral plants and coral fans (including dead ones)
ActualRequirements: Obtain the following items: All five colors of both living and dead coral plants, coral fans and coral blocks

Description: Feed a dolphin fish to have it lead you to treasure
Enter a bubble column
Explore some Underwater Ruins
ActualRequirements: Enter an Ocean Ruin

Description: Come across a sunken ship
Get in a boat within a shipwreck
ActualRequirements: Start riding a boat that is inside a shipwreck

Description: Find a shipwreck in an iceberg biome
ActualRequirements: Enter a Shipwreck in a Frozen Ocean or Deep Frozen Ocean biome

Description: Use a treasure map to find Buried Treasure
ActualRequirements: Open a Buried Treasure chest for the first time

Description: Construct a Conduit in the ocean
Notes: Known as "Power of the Ocean" until 1.9, when it was renamed after its Bedrock counterpart

Description: Travel at least 1000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. It's not that far in real life
ActualRequirements: Travel beyond 1000 or -1000 in the x or z direction

Description: Travel at least 10,000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. A journey that long begins with a simple step
ActualRequirements: Travel beyond 10000 or -10000 in the x or z direction

Description: A hundred kilometres!
ActualRequirements: Travel beyond 100000 or -100000 in the x or z direction

Description: Discover every forest biome
ActualRequirements: Enter the following biomes: Forest, Flower Forest, Birch Forest, Tall Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Plains, Sunflower Plains, Taiga, Giant Tree Taiga and Giant Spruce Taiga

Description: Discover every dry biome
ActualRequirements: Enter the following biomes: Desert, Savanna, Savanna Plateau, Windswept Savanna, Badlands, Eroded Badlands and Wooded Badlands Plateau

Description: Discover every snow biome
ActualRequirements: Enter the following biomes: Snowy Tundra, Ice Spikes, Snowy Taiga, Frozen River, and Snowy Beach
Notes: Formerly known as "Snow Feet" until 1.13 Alpha Build 1

Description: Discover every overgrown biome
ActualRequirements: Enter the following biomes: Swamp, Mangrove Swamp, Jungle, Jungle Edge, Bamboo Jungle, Mushroom Fields and Cherry Grove

Description: Discover every mountain biome
ActualRequirements:
Enter the following biomes: Stone Shore, Windswept Hills, Windswept Forest, Windswept Gravelly Hills, Meadow, Grove, Snowy Slopes, Frozen Peaks, Jagged Peaks
and Stony Peaks
Notes: Formerly known as "Cold Feet" until 1.13 Alpha Build 1

Description: Discover every wet biome
ActualRequirements:
Enter the following biomes: Enter a Ocean, Deep Ocean, River, Beach, Cold Ocean, Deep Cold Ocean, Frozen Ocean, Deep Frozen Ocean, Lukewarm Ocean, 
Deep Lukewarm Ocean and Warm Ocean

Description: Discover each type of surface biome in the Overworld
ActualRequirements:
Enter at least one biome of the following categories: Snowy Tundra, Snowy Taiga, Windswept Hills, Taiga, Giant Tree Taiga, Plains, Forest, Birch Forest, 
Dark Forest, Swamp, Jungle, River, Beach, Mushroom Fields, Desert, Savanna, Badlands, Warm Ocean,
Lukewarm Ocean, Ocean, Cold Ocean, Frozen Ocean, Meadow, Snowy Slopes/Grove, Peaks, Cherry Grove
